mapper.select: select t.id from pt_sys_party_user_config t where t.delflag=0 and t.app_id=#{appId} and t.user_id=#{userId}

select count(t.id) from pt_sys_party_user_config t left join pt_sys_party_integrate_app a on t.app_id=a.id left join pt_sys_org_user u on t.user_id=u.id where t.delflag=0
and a.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')

SELECT t.id as id, t.user_id as userId, t.app_id as appId, t.token, t.start_time as startTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.status, t.remark, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_date as updateDate, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.tend_id as tendId, t.delflag as delflag from pt_sys_party_user_config t where t.delflag=0 and t.app_id =#{appId}

SELECT t.id as id, t.user_id as userId, t.app_id as appId, t.token, t.start_time as startTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.status, t.remark, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_date as updateDate, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.tend_id as tendId, t.delflag as delflag, a.name as appName, u.real_name as realName from pt_sys_party_user_config t left join pt_sys_party_integrate_app a on t.app_id=a.id left join pt_sys_org_user u on t.user_id=u.id where t.delflag=0 and t.id=#{userConfigId}
